ValidationRule.description: To avoid EU user to manually change the Account Owner of a EU Customer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , RecordType.DeveloperName = "EU_Customer" , OR ( $Profile.Name = "EU Sales User", $Profile.Name = "EU Technical User" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Owner of a customer in Salesforce.
